meta.hint:
If you don't know the meaning of a word, look for context clues.
They are nearby words that help you figure out the meaning of a new word.
Example - Megan was glum when her best friend moved away.
You can guess that 'glum' means 'sad'.
meta.question: Use nearby words or context to identify the  meaning of a word.

content.description: Look at the images in this book. They show gardens in Japan. What do images mean?
The biscuits were good, but the cake was dreadful. What does dreadful mean?
The puppy was famished. She ate everything we gave her. What does famished mean?
Without water, these flowers will shrivel. What does shrivel mean?
Are you going on a brief trip or a long one? What does brief mean?
Max moved to a distant town, and now we never see him anymore. What does distant mean?
